turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I need to book an appointment with Dr. Hanson for my annual check-up. It's really overdue and I'm feeling a bit anxious about it.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello. I can assist with scheduling your annual check-up with Dr. Hanson. To begin, could you please provide your full name and date of birth for verification?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, my name is Emily Carter, and my date of birth is October 26, 1992. Look, I really need something in the next two weeks, preferably in the afternoon. It feels impossible to get a timely appointment lately. Can you even see *all* of Dr. Hanson's open appointments, or just the ones marked for online booking? Because I've tried calling and they say different things sometimes.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you, Emily. I have located your profile. I access the same appointment system used by the clinic staff. While I can see standard available slots, there might be last-minute cancellations or specific holds the front desk manages directly. Looking at the next two weeks, Dr. Hanson has an opening on [Date, two weeks out] at 3:15 PM. Would this time work for your annual check-up?
